data.text: @cityofsaskatoon @stoontransit This is hilarious.  The “science”has proven the masks don’t do shit.
@retlifo2h @cityofsaskatoon @stoontransit Cool story bro. Wheres your facts? You have none. You just have baseless conspiracy garbage.
@YowMoba @cityofsaskatoon @stoontransit You might want to direct that at scott moe, not the city of saskatoon. They are actually pushing back at his moronic decision by keeping masks in place.

@TurdFer76886254 @sodonewithcovid @cityofsaskatoon @stoontransit so that the people who dont want to wear one dont have to ?... i mean obviously the city aint finna force u not to wear one. i really dont see the problem.
@EvHanson2 @cityofsaskatoon @stoontransit @Mayor_Bowman You're still more than free to wear a mask or 3 if you choose..
@cityofsaskatoon @stoontransit @Mayor_Bowman  - really disappointed in your decision to lift mask mandates for COW facilities. I am gobsmacked by your decision to drop mask mandates on transit.
@cityofsaskatoon @stoontransit Thank you for being Science and Medical fact driven in your choices!!!
